mapper.select: SELEct country, AVG(age) AS age FROM player GROUP BY country ORDER BY country
SELECT gender, COUNT(gender) AS count FROM player GROUP BY gender
SELECT YEAR(joindate) AS year , country AS 나라 , COUNT(*) AS count FROM player GROUP BY YEAR(joindate), country ORDER BY YEAR(joindate), country;
SELECT YEAR(joindate) AS year , sum(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY YEAR(joindate)) AS sumCount FROM player GROUP BY YEAR(joindate) ORDER BY YEAR(joindate)
